pages.text: The $(item)Fire Tablet$(0), a $(thing)legendary item, $(0)said to grant it's wearer the power to swim in lava and withstand any heat. $(br2)While any records of its creation have been lost, there may still be one, somewhere in the world

Records speak of the transport of this relic via $(thing)ship$(0), others indicate sighting in $(thing)underground libraries$(0) or an $(thing)otherworldly city$(0). $(br2)Maybe $(thing)someone$(0), or something in an fiery, $(thing)hellish$(0) hot place, may posses one and would be willing to part with it, for the right $(thing)price$(0) of course.
